name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clipboard Monkey - Easy Clipboard Monitor and Manager

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage your clipboard history with ease. Supports text and images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📋 Clipboard Monkey: Efficient Clipboard History Manager / Monitor

Clipboard Monkey is your ultimate clipboard history manager, making it easy to save and organize your copied text and images.

Key Features:

🚀 Instant Save: Automatically store copied text and images for quick access.
🧹 Smart Sorting: Effortlessly delete individual entries or clear all with a single click.
🖼️ Versatile Image Handling: Copy images directly, save their URLs, or reopen them instantly.
💡 User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design to boost your productivity and streamline your workflow.
📂 Comprehensive Clipboard Management: Manage both text and image clipboard history with ease.

Discover the convenience and efficiency of managing your clipboard history with Clipboard Monkey!

Developed by ExtensionMonkey.de - Free Chrome extensions and useful tools! 🎉
